article:
I have a new friend. _ name is Lucy. We study in Beijing Sunshine Secondary School. She is in Class Five. I am in Class One. We are not in the same class. Lucy's favorite lesson is Music. She has a lot of CDs. She likes listening to music very much. She likes reading, too. After school we often read books in the library. She is very _ , and she often helps other students with their English .
Lucy is not Chinese. She is an _ girl. Lucy comes to Beijing with her family. Her father is an English teacher. Her mother is a _ , she works in a big hospital. They work from Monday _ Friday. At weekends, her mother likes shopping and her father likes fishing. Sometimes they go to the park. They all like Chinese food. They _ very happy. They like living in China.
